mapper.select: select id from sandp.sanddankill where singDanlasthit = #{singDanlasthit,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id ASC limit 1
select id from sandp.sanddankill where singDanlasthit = #{singDanlasthit,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
select issue, sanDV, sanDsum, sanDkd, singDan, fiveDanV, sumDanV, kuaDanV from sandp.sanddankill where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT expertname FROM sandp.sanddankill WHERE id BETWEEN #{startid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{endid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY expertname ORDER BY id

select
from sandp.sanddankill WHERE id < #{expid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND expertname = #{expertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id desc limit 0,1

select id,issue,expertname,singDanhit,fiveDanhit,sumDanhit,kuaDanhit,singDanlasthit,singDanconhit,fiveDanlasthit,fiveDanconhit sumDanlasthit,sumDanconhit,kuaDanlasthit,kuaDanconhit from sandp.sanddankill WHERE issue = #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND expertname = #{expertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id,issue,expertname,singDanhit,fiveDanhit,sumDanhit,kuaDanhit,singDanlasthit,singDanconhit,fiveDanlasthit,fiveDanconhit, sumDanlasthit,sumDanconhit,kuaDanlasthit,kuaDanconhit from sandp.sanddankill WHERE id <= #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND expertname = #{expertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id desc

select id from sandp.sanddankill where spicerock = #{spicerock,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1

select id from sandp.sanddankill where fiveDanskewn = #{fiveDanskewn,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
select id from sandp.sanddankill where singDanEMA3 = #{singDanEMA3,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ORDER BY id ASC limit 1
select id from sandp.sanddankill where singDanEMA3 = #{singDanEMA3,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1

select id from sandp.sanddankill where singDFortEMA3 = #{singDFortEMA3,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1

select id,issue,expertname,spicerock,singDankd,singDan from sandp.sanddankill WHERE expertname = #{expertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND spicerock = #{spicerock,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND id <= #{endid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,issue,expertname,spicerock,singDankd,singDan from sandp.sanddankill WHERE id < #{expid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND expertname = #{expertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id desc limit 0,1
mapper.update: update sandp.sanddankill SET sandp.sanddankill.fiveDandiv= #{fiveDandiv,jdbcType=INTEGER},sandp.sanddankill.fiveDanskewn= #{fiveDanskewn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sandp.sanddankill.fiveDanacV= #{fiveDanacV,jdbcType=INTEGER},sandp.sanddankill.sumDandiv= #{sumDandiv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sandp.sanddankill.sumDanskewn= #{sumDanskewn,jdbcType=INTEGER},sandp.sanddankill.sumDanacV= #{sumDanacV,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sandp.sanddankill.kuaDandiv= #{kuaDandiv,jdbcType=INTEGER},sandp.sanddankill.kuaDanskewn= #{kuaDanskewn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sandp.sanddankill.kuaDanacV= #{kuaDanacV,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE sandp.sanddankill.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,issue,expertname,spicerock,singDankd,singDan from sandp.sanddankill WHERE id <= #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND expertname = #{expertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id desc
